FAQ

  • questions fréquemment posées

FAQ

+

Quelle est la durée minimum de séjour ?

To make a room reservation at our hotel, you can use our online service on the website or contact our reservation department by phone.

+

Acceptez vous les enfants ?

Yes, we are a pet-friendly hotel. We welcome guests to bring their well-behaved pets with them. Please check our pet policy for more details.

+

Prenez vous un acompte lors de la réservation ?

Our room rates include complimentary Wi-Fi, access to the fitness center, and daily breakfast. Additional amenities may vary depending on the room type. Please refer to the "Amenities" section for more details.

+

Quelles sont les conditions d’annulation ?

Yes, we provide on-site parking for our guests. There is a designated parking area, and parking is available at an additional cost. Please check with our front desk for parking options and rates.

+

Acceptez vous les animaux de compagnie ?

Yes, you can cancel or modify your reservation up to 24 hours before your scheduled arrival without incurring any charges. Please review our cancellation policy for more information.

+

Combien de personnes peuvent accueillir les chambres ?

We value your feedback! You can share your experience by completing our online feedback form, which will be sent to our customer service team. We appreciate your input to help us enhance our services.

+

Faites vous Tables d’hôtes ?

We value your feedback! You can share your experience by completing our online feedback form, which will be sent to our customer service team. We appreciate your input to help us enhance our services.

+

Peut-on cuisiner sur place ?

We value your feedback! You can share your experience by completing our online feedback form, which will be sent to our customer service team. We appreciate your input to help us enhance our services.

+

Que faire et voir à Fayence ?

We value your feedback! You can share your experience by completing our online feedback form, which will be sent to our customer service team. We appreciate your input to help us enhance our services.
